name: Tubby Nugget
desc: My boss really likes Tubby Nugget, so I drawn this one.

name: Philips TV
desc: Today I drawn my Philips TV from my couch.

name: Planted bush
desc: I love digital plants. It doesn't matter if you forget them; they don't die. But, I probably like them because they are green.

name: European flag
desc: Colleagues love the EU, with a small Euro flag on their desks. In gather.town, I improved the poorly rescaled flag with my drawing.
